scripts.install:link: (cd swarmsim-ts && yarn link) && (cd swarmsim-coffee && yarn link @swarmsim/ts)
scripts.install: yarn run install:link && (cd swarmsim-ts && yarn install && yarn build) && (cd swarmsim-coffee && yarn install)
scripts.build: (cd swarmsim-ts && yarn build) && (cd swarmsim-coffee && yarn build && cp -rp dist ..)
